products.name: Daily Routing Kit
products.description: Torriden DIVE-IN Cleansing Foam is a gentle, hydrating foam cleanser that removes dirt, oil, and makeup while maintaining the skinâ€™s moisture balance. This cleanser provides a deep yet soft cleanse, leaving the skin refreshed, clean, and hydrated without any tightness or dryness.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This cleanser has the perfect pH balance for healthy skin and contains natural BHA to gently exfoliate while cleansing.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to wet skin, gently massage in circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, especially oily and combination skin

products.name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
products.description: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula that helps reduce the appearance of skin blemishes and congestion.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This serum is incredibly effective at controlling oil production and reducing pore appearance without being harsh on the skin.
products.howToUse: Apply a few drops to clean skin in the morning and evening, before heavier creams. Avoid contact with eyes.
products.skinRecommendation: Ideal for oily and blemish-prone skin

products.name: Daily Moisturizing Lotion
products.description: A lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that helps hydrate the skin and restore its natural barrier with three essential ceramides.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This moisturizer is dermatologist-recommended and contains ceramides that help maintain the skin's natural barrier function.
products.howToUse: Apply liberally to face and body as needed, especially after cleansing or bathing.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for normal to dry skin

products.name: Liquid Exfoliant
products.description: A leave-on exfoliant with 2% BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acid) that unclogs pores, smooths wrinkles, and brightens skin tone.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This exfoliant is gentle yet effective, helping to clear pores and improve skin texture without irritation.
products.howToUse: Apply to clean skin with a cotton pad, avoiding the eye area. Use once or twice daily, starting with once daily.
products.skinRecommendation: Best for oily, combination, and acne-prone skin

products.name: Anthelios Ultra Light
products.description: A lightweight, fast-absorbing sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 60 protection and antioxidant protection.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This sunscreen provides excellent protection without leaving a white cast or greasy feeling, perfect for daily wear.
products.howToUse: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after swimming or sweating.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin

products.name: C-Firma Vitamin C Day
products.description: A potent vitamin C serum that brightens skin, reduces fine lines, and protects against environmental damage.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This vitamin C serum is incredibly effective at brightening and provides antioxidant protection throughout the day.
products.howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin in the morning, before sunscreen. Store in a cool, dark place.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, especially dull or aging skin

products.name: Ultra Facial Cream
products.description: A lightweight, 24-hour daily facial moisturizer that provides all-day hydration without leaving skin feeling greasy.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This moisturizer provides long-lasting hydration and works well under makeup without pilling.
products.howToUse: Apply morning and evening to clean skin, gently massaging until fully absorbed.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, especially normal to dry skin

products.name: Retinol Serum
products.description: A gentle retinol serum that helps reduce fine lines, improve skin texture, and promote cell turnover.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This retinol is gentle yet effective, perfect for beginners starting their retinol journey.
products.howToUse: Start with 2-3 times per week, applying at night. Always follow with sunscreen during the day.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, start slowly if new to retinol

products.name: Watermelon Niacinamide
products.description: A lightweight, hydrating serum with niacinamide and watermelon extract that provides a natural, dewy glow.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This serum gives the most beautiful natural glow while controlling oil and minimizing pores.
products.howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin morning and evening, before moisturizer.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, especially oily and combination skin

products.name: Green Clean Makeup
products.description: A gentle, effective cleansing balm that melts away makeup, sunscreen, and impurities while nourishing the skin.
products.whyOliLovesIt: This cleansing balm removes even waterproof makeup effortlessly while leaving skin soft and hydrated.
products.howToUse: Massage onto dry skin, add water to emulsify, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.
products.skinRecommendation: Suitable for all skin types, especially those who wear heavy makeup
